problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, D and E are the midpoints of AB and AC respectively. If the area  S~△ABC~ of △ABC = N_0 ^ 2, then the area S~△ADE~ of △ADE is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵D、E分别是AB、AC的中点,∴DE\overset{\parallel}{=}\frac{1}{2}BC,∴△ADE∽△ABC,∴\frac{AD}{AB}=\frac{DE}{BC}=\frac{1}{2},∴\frac{S_{\bigtriangleupADE}}{S_{\bigtriangleupABC}}=\frac{1}{4},∵△ABC的面积为S_{\bigtriangleupABC}=36cm²,∴△ADE的面积S~△ADE~=9cm²．故选:B．
